credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Drummer Seen from the Back
medium: Charcoal, white chalk on blue-green wove paper
description:
Recto: vertical view of the back of a drummer, shown facing left, and holding a drum.
Verso: vertical view of a soldier with an extended sword; and in horizontal direction from bottom to top are three soldiers who appear to be fighting.
name: Drawing
